abstract: Republican donor David Humphreys releases signed affidavit saying that Missouri's Republican Chairman John Hancock made negative remarks about Tom Schweich, state auditor who committed suicide amid perceptions that he was target of anti-Semitic whispering campaign; Humphreys is first person to publicly attest that Hancock made such remarks.
lead_paragraph: A Republican donor released a signed affidavit saying that Missouri’s Republican chairman, John Hancock, had made negative remarks about a state auditor who killed himself.

headline.main: Donor Says Missouri’s Republican Chairman Made Biased Remark
headline.print_headline: Donor Says Missouri Chairman of G.O.P. Made Biased Remark

snippet: A Republican donor released a signed affidavit saying that Missouri’s Republican chairman, John Hancock, had made negative remarks about a state auditor who killed himself.
